title: Yet another cool Moxie intro
body:
Leave it to Justin to use his superior editing skills to produce the next AWESOME Moxie intro. Enjoy!

<object width="425" height="350"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/u1NWVPfCKSY"></param><param name="wmode" value="transparent"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/u1NWVPfCKSY" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" width="425" height="350"></embed></object>
author: Dan

comments.author: El Brian de Moore
comments.body: no offense daniel... but im thinking this intro is about 30 times better than the *cough* cheesy *cough*  star wars intro...  ... i mean.. ahem.. uhm.. A for effort??  ... (use this one from now on)

comments.author: nicole
comments.body: Justin's too funny. Funnier than Dan!

comments.author: jhawk
comments.body:
1.  Play this as the new intro. 
2.  Sell oxygen.  
3.  Profit.
